results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying the root cause and metrics, with minor omissions in causal chain and unnecessary complexity in reasoning.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as a root cause and ruled out MMDVFS, but included PowerHal which was not mentioned in the gold standard.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of SW_REQ2.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: All relevant metrics were correctly identified and matched the gold standard.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS, but the inclusion of PowerHal adds unnecessary complexity.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but could be more directly aligned with the identified root cause.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and causal chains with minor omissions in metric precision and actionability details.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is well captured, including CM, PowerHal, DDR, and VCORE links.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, but some specific CPU frequencies are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical and relevant, but could be more detailed.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and metrics with logical reasoning. Minor improvements could be made in causal chain completeness and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to CM, PowerHal, and MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified most metrics, including VCORE and DDR percentages.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but could be more detailed.
